task.summary: added preferences screen to the App....So that we can use the refresh rate from the preferences settings
added some logic, to show different views, depending on user preferences.
Implemented ButterKnife framework, for all buttons on the first settings activity and made it work...
added alternate mode - so now views are alternating.
creating the new data model - so we can retrieve hourly and daily forecasts
added google text to speech library - speaking temperature now.

Did some tweaking on the first activity - to show the longitude and the latitude, location and name.
Took off parse references
added ability to speak when weather summary changes.
Added an option to show hourly forecast
Fix daily and hourly views - and also added swipe left and right
Added swipe left to right, from the different activities - and also add an option in preferences to manage screen on settings.
added shutdown feature - and removed the swipe left and right, since it was causing some issues.

MESSAGE.value: added preferences screen to the App....
added preferences screen to the App....so that now, we can change the refresh rate .
added preferences screen to the App....So that we can use the refresh rate from the preferences settings
created a new brief layout - horizental and vertical layout.
added some logic, to show different views, depending on user preferences.
Implemented ButterKnife framework, for all buttons on the first settings activity and made it work...
added alternate mode - so now views are alternating.
creating the new data model - so we can retrieve hourly and daily forecasts
added google text to speech library - speaking temperature now.

Did some tweaking on the first activity - to show the longitude and the latitude, location and name.
Took off parse references
added ability to speak when weather summary changes.
Added an option to show hourly forecast
Fix daily and hourly views - and also added swipe left and right
Added swipe left to right, from the different activities - and also add an option in preferences to manage screen on settings.
added shutdown feature - and removed the swipe left and right, since it was causing some issues.

option.value: added shutdown feature - and removed the swipe left and right, since it was causing some issues.
